longBusinessSummary: Orogen Royalties Inc. operates as a mineral exploration company in Canada, the United States, Mexico, Argentina, and Kenya. The company operates through Mineral Royalties and Mineral Exploration Project Generation segments. It has a portfolio of gold, zinc, copper, silver, and precious metal royalty projects. In addition, the company holds interest in the Lake Victoria Gold Fields in western Kenya; the Celts epithermal gold-silver project in Walker Lane, Nevada; the Cuprite gold project located in Nevada; and La Verdad epithermal gold-silver project in Durango, Mexico. It has an option to acquire interest in the Si2; Llano del Nogal; Astro; Pearl String; Maggie Creek; and Ball Creek East projects. The company was formerly known as Evrim Resources Corp. and changed its name to Orogen Royalties Inc. in August 2020. Orogen Royalties Inc. was incorporated in 2005 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
